import React, {useState, useContext} from 'react' import {baseUrl} from '../context' import {LoginContext} from '../context' import axios from 'axios' import mainImg from './img/img-01.png' import './login.css' import './util.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function login() { const {setUser} =useContext(LoginContext)///changer user remember const [Email, setEmail] = useState('') const [Password, setPassword] = useState('') const handleLogin = (e) => { e.preventDefault() axios.post(baseUrl,{email :Email,password :Password}).then((resolve)=>{ // setUser(resolve.data); console.log(resolve.data); }) // Write to='' submit parameters are email, pwd } return (
Member Login
setEmail(e.target.value) } placeholder="Email"/>
setPassword(e.target.value) } placeholder="Password"/>
Forgot Username / Password?
Create your Account
) } export default login
